data.label: perf
data.description: libperf是一个围绕系统调用perf_event_open()的库。该库向用户空间代码公开内核性能计数器子系统。它可以与内核支持一起有效地跟踪代码的部分。

data.label: perf
data.description: libperf is a library that wraps around the syscall perf_event_open(). This library exposes the kernel performance counters subsystem to userspace code. It can be used to efficiently trace portions of code with kernel support.
